message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,000,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600,000. I'm trying to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $600,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider $900,000.
I'm still interested in the product, but $900,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $700,000. Can we discuss further?
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $700,000.  My absolute floor is $850,000. This is a final offer.
